title: Biden Unveils New Covid-19 Strategy for Next Phase of Response
sub_head: The administration will need to secure enough funding to fulfill an array of plans
body:
Moving the United States beyond the Covid-19 pandemic will require vigilance for new variants, measures to prevent businesses and schools from shutting down, and continued global vaccine donations, according to a blueprint released Wednesday by the Biden administration.
The plan underscores the administrationâ€™s shifting focus from responding to the pandemic crisis to a new normal that focuses on managing the disease. But the road map, the result of weeks of work with advisers, state leaders and public health experts, relies heavily on Congress approving billions of dollars in new Covid-19 relief funding.
